contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: If you want us to reply, please also enter your email address.
contact.alt: Or send us an email at

inputs.privacy: By submitting this form you agree with our

indexer.title: Enemy city index
indexer.indexMoved: this index has been moved by the index owner! Contact the owner of this index to get a new link to the moved index.

cleanup.loggedIn: You are currently logged in to delete records.
cleanup.deletedAfter24Hrs: Records marked for deletion will be deleted after 24 hours.
cleanup.signOut: if you wish to sign out.

tooltips.startCleanupInfo: Start a cleanup session that will allow you to remove selected intel records.
tooltips.delayInfo: There is a small delay of up to 3 minutes before new reports are shown on this page.
tooltips.allianceContributionInfo: Any alliance with atleast a 5% contribution is considered an owner and will not be indexed. The index administrator can add or remove alliances.
tooltips.intelDeletedInfo: Intel gets deleted if a town is conquested by another player.

explain.welcomeToYourIndex: Welcome to your unique enemy city indexer page!
explain.followThese2Steps: Follow the 2 steps below to install the userscript and start collecting enemy intel.
explain.aboutTampermonkey: Tampermonkey is the world's most popular userscript manager.
explain.restart: Restart your browser if you just installed Tampermonkey.
explain.step2ExplainScript: Each index has a uniquely generated userscript that will allow you to upload intelligence to this specific index. Install the userscript and share it with your allies to start collecting intelligence in index
explain.installedOkInfo: Restart your browser and start collecting intel! The userscript will allow you to index reports from your alliance forum or from your personal inbox. Simply click the 'index +' button to upload a new report.
explain.spreadTheIndex: Spread the index to your alliance members so they can help you collect more intelligence about your enemies.
explain.mayTake3Minutes: It may take up to 3 minutes before new reports are shown on your index overview.
explain.notYetReceivedAnyReports: We have not yet received any reports for this index
